Author: nintentions
Text: fuck i feel you on this. every lb i lose i feel uglier and uglier - like it’s never enough. will it reach a point where it’ll be “enough”, and i’ll finally like what i see in the mirror? or will i fade away, constantly hating everything about myself, until i die of a heart attack or some shit? who knows bucko. but do know that you’re not alone in this

Author: vanillastevia
Text: I know exactly what you mean. I felt worse too after losing weight because I was starting to recognize myself again and the realization my problems were so much deeper than my weight really fucked me up and I just really understand how you feel right now. After a while though once I stopped “expecting” to feel a certain way it did get a bit better but I had to really try and forget that I had a body and the starving was complete self harm at that point.
